title: [GAMEPLAY] Singed his fling doesn't work properly
body:
On {{champion:27}}  when you try to fling your enemy and quickly walk backwards your target is just going to get knocked up instead of thrown backwards as it supposed to. just had this in a normal game just some minutes ago and it also happend some time ago but I thought it was just lag but it seems like it is occuring in more of my games. So how this bug works is when you walk up to your target and fling him and quickly turn around the enemy will be knocked up instead of thrown backwards.

That was my bug report...

Not entirely sure if this has anything to do with ping/ms but hope I get a answer soon ^^

replies.body:
Hey xXCloud,

This is a known issue, and a fix is being worked on. Thanks for the report and reproduction steps!

I'm sure you guys are aware, but this bug has been present for quite some time and I want to do everything in my power to expedite the fix. 
This has nothing to do with Singed's movement during or before the cast of the flip. This only happens when the target of the flip is at max, or beyond max, range of the flip at the time that it activates. If you are well within range of the enemy (ie. standing nearly on top of them) the bug is not reproducable under any circumstances. When the target is fleeing, as they often do when a singed is running at them, it will occur almost every time. 

TLDR Bug only occurs when attempting to flip someone at max range or beyond.

Thank you for explaining the bug to me I was already kinda wondering if it really was a bug where if you walk away from the enemy and fling but seems like it isn't the issue :P I sincerely apologize if I confused anyone and thanks again for explaining it to me BigNuttz xD!!!

I have had the same issue, but turning with the flip doesn't seem to effect it. I have Juarez casted my e on the enemy and let singed walk up to them and use it and they were just knocked up not foiled.

This bug has easily robbed me of a few kills and really screws the ability to fully enjoy Singed's kit as it's the surefire way to make someone so mad and dead they just don't know what to do! Rito please fix this as soon as possible so I can Proxy to my heart's desire!
Yea :'( this bug made me rage inside for the whole game. Hope Riot will fix it soon !! ^^
